name: Honke Sankyo Fever 3: Jikki Simulation
overview: Honke Sankyo Fever Jikki Simulation 3 ("Sankyo Fever Original Machine Simulation 2") is a 1996 pachinko game for the Super Famicom and the follow up to Honke Sankyo Fever Jikki Simulation 2, released the previous year. It is the last title of the Honke Sankyo Fever Jikki Simulation sub-series of games, part of the larger Sankyo Fever franchise. Like its predecessors, the game features a number of simulations of real-life pachinko machines that the player can practice on and study to prepare them for the real thing. These machines were produced by Sankyo, a manufacturer of pachinko machines in Japan, and the game (and the series) is named for them.
